resources.string: WARNING: Next update might reset everything. Click here for more info…

Features presented in this (explorer) tab are in beta state. They ARE functional. Your setting will take effect the next time you select the concerned Units / Categories. But your setting MAY be lost in the future updates. I will try to keep your setting. But I cannot guarantee (for now). Anyway, these features are tested and functional. You can benefit them (until the next release).
Most configuration changes will be applied the next time you select the concerned units/categories. Swith to other unit of other category to make sure your configuration is applied.
